meanings.definition: Intended for a particular purpose or outcome.
meanings.sent1: The special key was destined to unlock the treasure chest.
meanings.sent2: The chosen hero was destined to defeat the evil dragon.
meanings.sent3: The magical wand was destined to turn everything into cheese!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was destined to light up the darkest room.
meanings.sent5: The ancient prophecy foretold of a destined warrior who would bring peace to the land.

meanings.sent1: The storm clouds gathering in the sky were destined to bring heavy rain.
meanings.sent2: The train was destined to arrive at the station right on time.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy magician was destined to make a mess of his magic show.
meanings.sent4: His reckless behavior was destined to lead to trouble.
meanings.sent5: The sun setting over the horizon was destined to mark the end of another day.
